summary: wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()
details:
wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.213 by commit f4c4637a3836c5b78f3d3e254ca3b1f0d6bb0308, it was introduced in version v5.4.211 by commit 73304c7594080362107bea4c0c3b7da2fb134cc4. For more details please see the references link.
